00021 #include <QtGui>
00022 #include "renderarea.h"
00023 #include "pixmaps.h"
00024 
00025 RenderArea::RenderArea(QWidget *parent)
00026     : QWidget(parent)
00027 {
00028         setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Base);
00029         setAutoFillBackground(true);
00030 
00031         setFixedWidth(600);
00032         setFixedHeight(500);
00033 }
00034 
00035 void RenderArea::draw(QPainter *painter)
00036 {
00037         static const QPoint points[4] = {
00038                 QPoint(10, 80),
00039                 QPoint(20, 10),
00040                 QPoint(80, 30),
00041                 QPoint(90, 70)
00042         };
00043 
00044         QRect rect(10, 20, 80, 60);
00045 
00046         QPainterPath path;
00047         path.moveTo(20, 80);
00048         path.lineTo(20, 30);
00049         path.cubicTo(80, 0, 50, 50, 80, 80);
00050 
00051         int startAngle = 20 * 16;
00052         int arcLength = 120 * 16;
00053 
00054         QLinearGradient linearGrad(QPointF(0, 0), QPointF(100, 100));
00055         linearGrad.setColorAt(0, Qt::black);
00056         linearGrad.setColorAt(1, Qt::red);
00057 
00058         QRadialGradient radialGrad(QPointF(50, 50), 40, QPointF(75, 50));
00059         radialGrad.setColorAt(0, Qt::white);
00060         radialGrad.setColorAt(0.5, Qt::black);
00061         radialGrad.setColorAt(1, Qt::red);
00062 
00063         QConicalGradient conGrad(QPointF(50, 50), 90);
00064         conGrad.setColorAt(0, Qt::red);
00065         conGrad.setColorAt(1, Qt::black);
00066         //conGrad.setCoordinateMode(QGradient::StretchToDeviceMode);
00067 
00068         QBrush brush = QBrush(Qt::gray);
00069         int brushStyle = Qt::NoBrush;
00070         int penStyle = Qt::NoPen;
00071         int shape = Rect;
00072         int drawnRects = 0;
00073         for (int x = 0; x < width(); x += 100){
00074                 for (int y = 0; y < height(); y += 100){
00075                         painter->save();
00076                         painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00077 
00078                         shape = (shape + 1)%14;
00079 
00080                         penStyle = (penStyle + 1)%4;
00081                         if(!penStyle)
00082                                 penStyle = 1;
00083 
00084                         if (shape == RoundedRect && drawnRects < 3){
00085                                 if (drawnRects == 0)
00086                                         painter->setBrush(QBrush(linearGrad));
00087                                 else if (drawnRects == 1)
00088                                         painter->setBrush(QBrush(radialGrad));
00089                                 else if (drawnRects == 2)
00090                                         painter->setBrush(QBrush(conGrad));
00091                                 drawnRects++;
00092                         } else {
00093                                 brushStyle = (brushStyle + 1)%14;
00094                                 if(!brushStyle)
00095                                         brushStyle = 1;
00096                                 brush.setStyle((Qt::BrushStyle)brushStyle);
00097                                 painter->setBrush(brush);
00098                         }
00099 
00100                         painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 2, (Qt::PenStyle)penStyle, Qt::FlatCap, Qt::MiterJoin));
00101                         painter->translate(x, y);
00102                         switch (shape){
00103                                 case Line:
00104                                         painter->drawLine(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.topRight());
00105                                         break;
00106                                 case Polyline:
00107                                         painter->drawPolyline(points, 4);
00108                                         break;
00109                                 case Polygon:
00110                                         painter->drawPolygon(points, 4);
00111                                         break;
00112                                 case Rect:
00113                                         painter->drawRect(rect);
00114                                         break;
00115                                 case RoundedRect:
00116                                         painter->drawRoundedRect(rect, 25, 25, Qt::RelativeSize);
00117                                         break;
00118                                 case Ellipse:
00119                                         painter->drawEllipse(rect);
00120                                         break;
00121                                 case Arc:
00122                                         painter->drawArc(rect, startAngle, arcLength);
00123                                         break;
00124                                 case Chord:
00125                                         painter->drawChord(rect, startAngle, arcLength);
00126                                         break;
00127                                 case Pie:
00128                                         painter->drawPie(rect, startAngle, arcLength);
00129                                         break;
00130                                 case Path:
00131                                         painter->drawPath(path);
00132                                         break;
00133                                 case Text:
00134                                         painter->drawText(rect, Qt::AlignCenter, "EmfEngine demo");
00135                                         break;
00136                                 case Pixmap:
00137                                         painter->drawPixmap(10, 10, QPixmap(qt_logo_xpm));
00138                                         break;
00139                                 case TiledPixmap:
00140                                         painter->drawTiledPixmap (QRect(10, 10, 64, 64), QPixmap(brick_xpm));
00141                                         break;
00142                         }
00143                         painter->restore();
00144                 }
00145         }
00146 
00147         painter->setPen(Qt::darkGray);
00148         painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
00149         painter->drawRect(QRect(9, 9, width() - 18, height() - 18));
00150 }
00151 
00152 void RenderArea::paintEvent(QPaintEvent * /* event */)
00153 {
00154         QPainter painter(this);
00155         draw(&painter);
00156 }
